import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import {minutesToDuration, secondsToDuration} from "../utils/duration" function Pomodoro() { // Timer starts out paused const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); const [timer, setTimer] = useState(1500) const [breakDuration,setBreakDuration] = useState(300); console.log(isTimerRunning) useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running setTimer(timer-1) }, isTimerRunning ? 1000 : null ); function playPause() { setIsTimerRunning((prevState) => !prevState); } const minusHandler = () => { setTimer(timer-300) } return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {secondsToDuration(timer)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: {secondsToDuration(breakDuration)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
{/* TODO: Implement stopping the current focus or break session and disable when there is no active session */}
{/* TODO: This area should show only when a focus or break session is running or pauses */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) and total duration */}

Focusing for 25:00 minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below to include time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(timer)} remaining

); } export default Pomodoro;
